main event: A bright light was seen in the sky over New York City, which moved rapidly and erratically for about 3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light that moved in an erratic course.
The report states that no further investigation was made and there was insufficient data to reach a definite conclusion.
The witness expressed uncertainty about what the object could be, but believed it was some type of intelligently controlled machine rather than a natural phenomenon.
The witness decided not to report the sighting to authorities, as they only caught a brief glimpse and were unsure of the significance.
The report includes details from a questionnaire filled out by the witness, including information about the weather conditions and their background.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
